snippet: Deputies have arrested four young men — one adult and three juveniles — suspected of breaking into a Foster Farms chicken ranch and killing more than 900 birds with a golf club.
abstract: California deputies arrest four young men--one adult and three juveniles--suspected of breaking into a Foster Farms chicken ranch south of Fresno and killing more than 900 birds with a golf club.
lead_paragraph: Deputies have arrested four young men — one adult and three juveniles — suspected of breaking into a Foster Farms chicken ranch and killing more than 900 birds with a golf club.

headline.main: California: 4 Arrested in Clubbing Deaths of Chickens
headline.print_headline: California: 4 Arrested in Clubbing Deaths of Chickens
